actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the unified credit against estate and gift taxes to provide that $400,000 of property shall be exempt from such taxes, and to provide an inflation adjustment of such amount.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the unified tax credit for both estate and gift taxes from $47,000 to $121,800, with annual inflation adjustments.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the unified credit against estate and gift taxes to provide that $400,000 of property shall be exempt from such taxes, and to provide an inflation adjustment of such amount.
